EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Survival is not Mandatory CNJ Minneapolis_Q217.2017 Field Event Pos
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us in Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for joining us at the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java event with Josh Long in Minneapolis. If you enjoyed this event we would love for you to join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to experience more talks by Josh and other Spring advocates. Please use one of our discount codes below to save an additional $200 off the full conference pass price.
- S1P200_Hoffacker: Contact Matthew Nelson (mnelson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mnelson@pivotal.io]]>) - S1P200_MNelson: Contact Michael Hoffacker (mhoffacker@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mhoffacker@pivotal.io]]>) - S1P200_Iverson: Contact David Iverson (diverson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:diverson@pivotal.io]]>)
If you are interested in having Pivotal present Spring content to your organization or want to keep the conversation going please contact me at mnelson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mnelson@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a follow up with our team. Thank you again for joining us! The Pivotal Team
